Nutrition is the process of providing the body with necessary food and drinks. It involves the intake of nutrients, like proteins, vitamins, and minerals, which help maintain health. Balanced nutrition supports growth, repairs tissues, and boosts immunity. Eating a variety of fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains ensures a well-rounded diet. Staying hydrated is also crucial, as water aids in digestion and nutrient absorption. Regular physical activity complements good nutrition, promoting overall well-being.
